title: Researching the story
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Video tape recorders and recording
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cinematography
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Video recording - Production and direction
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Video tape recorders and recording
description: Episode number 6 of Series "Video tech". This episode overviews the first part of storytelling - finding a story people can relate to. It describes research techniques such as defining what is a story, story telling styles, finding the angle, getting the facts, developing sources, finding the people, preparing the shoot, briefing the crew and meeting deadlines.
